title: Police Dashcam Video Expected As Soon As Today
teaser: Investigators in North Charleston, S.C. are expected to release police dashcam video in the shooting death of a black motorist.
contentencoded:
In North Charleston, S.C., investigators are expected to release police dashcam video as soon as today, in order to try to shed more light on the struggle last weekend between white police officer Michael Slager and black motorist Walter Scott, who was shot in the back and killed by Slager after a traffic stop.

There are still unanswered questions about the incident, including what happened with the officer’s Taser. Andrew Knapp has been covering the story for theÂ Charleston Post & Courier and joins Here & Now’s Robin Young with details.

Guest

  • Andrew Knapp, reporter covering public safety for the Charleston Post & Courier. He tweets @offlede.
